Name: Bravo, Flattering Showman
Functional Text: **Action** - {r}{r}, {t}: Turn a face-down card in your arsenal face-up. If it has crush, it gets +2{p} and **dominate** this turn. **Go again**

Name: Cracker Jax
Functional Text: **Action** - Destroy this: The next attack action card you play this turn gets +1{p}. **Go again**

Name: Debilitate
Functional Text: **Crush** - When this deals 4 or more damage to a hero, their first attack during their next turn gets -2{p}.

Name: Knock 'Em Off Their Feet
Functional Text: **Crush** - When this deals 4 or more damage to a hero, {t} them.

Name: Crash Down
Functional Text: At the start of your turn, destroy this, then the next Guardian attack action card you play this turn gets +6{p}.

Name: Buckling Blow
Functional Text: **Crush** - When this deals 4 or more damage to a hero, put a -1{d} counter on an equipment they control.

Name: Clash of Mountains
Functional Text: When this defends a Guardian attack, **clash** with the attacking hero. The winner creates a Seismic Surge token.

Name: Disable
Functional Text: **Crush** - When this deals 4 or more damage to a hero, put a card from their arsenal on the bottom of their deck.

Name: Flatten the Field
Functional Text: **Crush** - When this deals 4 or more damage to a hero, destroy a Seismic Surge token they control.

Name: Grind Them Down
Functional Text: **Crush** - When this deals 4 or more damage to a hero, destroy the top card of their deck.

Name: Reinforce the Line
Functional Text: Target defending attack action card gets +2{d}.

Name: Crash and Bash
Functional Text: When this defends, you may reveal a card with crush from your hand. If you do, create a Seismic Surge token.

Name: Seismic Surge
Functional Text: At the beginning of your action phase, destroy this, then the next Guardian attack action card you play this turn costs {r} less to play.
